oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: The Bloody War, song from 81st Division show
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Pvt. Emmett Moorer, Co. B, 306th Amm. Train, sent these lyrics home to his father in Henning, Lauderdale County, Tennessee. His father was Dr. H. B. Moorer who built the first brick house in Henning. The song relates the story of a farm boy drafted into the army for World War I and his experiences in the bloody war.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: World War, 1914-1918; World War, 1914-1918 - History
